verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1166>showed<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G2986>clear<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2930>crystal<s%>, <S%G1607>proceeding<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%>.

<S%G1722>In<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G4113>street<s%> of <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> on <S%G2532>either<s%> <S%G1782>side<s%> <S%G1782><s%> of the <S%G4215>river<s%>, was there the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, which <S%G4160>bore<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> manner of <S%G2590>fruits<s%>, and <S%G591>yielded<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3376>month<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5444>leaves<s%> of the <S%G3586>tree<s%> were <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2322>healing<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G2652>curse<s%>: <S%G2532>but<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> shall <S%G3000>serve<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>:
<S%G2532>And<s%> they shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> shall be <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3359>foreheads<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>they<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3088>candle<s%>, <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5461>gives<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5461>light<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%> are <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G228>true<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> to <S%G1166>show<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034>shortly<s%> be <S%G1096>done<s%>.

<S%G2400>Behold<s%>, I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>: <S%G3107>blessed<s%> is <S%G3588>he<s%> that <S%G5083>keeps<s%> the <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G991>saw<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2532>them<s%>. And <S%G3753>when<s%> I had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G991>seen<s%>, I fell <S%G4098>down<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of the <S%G32>angel<s%> which <S%G1166>showed<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>.

<S%G2532>Then<s%> says <S%G3004>he<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G3708>See<s%> you do it <S%G3361>not<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4889>fellowservant<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of them which <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book<s%>: <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G4972>Seal<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> at <S%G1451>hand<s%>.

He that is <S%G91>unjust<s%>, let him be <S%G91>unjust<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he which is <S%G4510>filthy<s%>, let him be <S%G4510>filthy<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he that is <S%G1342>righteous<s%>, let him be <S%G1344>righteous<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he that is <S%G40>holy<s%>, let him be <S%G37>holy<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> is <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>, to <S%G591>give<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%>.

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1>Alpha<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5598>Omega<s%>, the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>, the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%>.

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are <S%G3588>they<s%> that <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G2071>have<s%> <S%G1849>right<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> may enter <S%G1525>in<s%> through the <S%G4440>gates<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>.

<S%G1161>For<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> are <S%G2965>dogs<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5333>sorcerers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4205>whoremongers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5406>murderers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1496>idolaters<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G5368>loves<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>makes<s%> a <S%G5579>lie<s%>.

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> have <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> to <S%G3140>testify<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%>. <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G4491>root<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1085>offspring<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, and the <S%G2986>bright<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3720>morning<s%> <S%G792>star<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3565>bride<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G2064>Come<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> let him that <S%G191>hears<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%>, <S%G2064>Come<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> let him that is <S%G1372>thirsty<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> whoever <S%G2309>will<s%>, let him <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1432>freely<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G4828>testify<s%> to every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book<s%>, <S%G1437>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> shall <S%G2007>add<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G2007>add<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G4127>plagues<s%> that are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G975>book<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> shall take <S%G851>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> shall take <S%G851>away<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G575>out<s%> of the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from the things which are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G975>book<s%>.

He <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3140>testifies<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%>, <S%G3483>Surely<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>. Even <S%G3483>so<s%>, <S%G2064>come<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
